arts.sum: Ligue 1 McDonald’s, Round 33, 10/05/25 AS Monaco beat Olympique Lyonnais (2-0) to mathematically secure qualification in next season’s UEFA Champions League with rivals elsewhere slipping up. The Match Lyon…

arts.ttl: Lyon predicted XI v Monaco: Corentin Tolisso out, Alexandre Lacazette to start
